channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - September 23, 2022
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-september-23-2022) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Bump in the Dark_ * _Fading Suns_ * _Fallout 2d20_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Nahual_ * _Songs for the Dusk_ * _Starscape_ * _The Between_ * _The Veil_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - September 23, 2022

item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:
